opinion.opinion_text:
The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of October 2005 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time for Filing State's Petition for Writ of Certiorari:
Motion Allowed. Defendant shall have up to and including the 13th day of January 2005 to file and serve his/her response with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of October 2005.
